page.title: 16CRAFTS-LEATHER
page.content: There are plenty of leather shops in Cornwall but there is only one leather shop in St.Merryn.We interviewed Peter a craftsman who ownes the leather shop.Peter started making and selling leather in 1980 . He started making leather because he needed a job and he had been offered one working in leather . Last year apart from his leather job he worked in a meat factory.He makes his own leather goods but he buys already tanned skins.Peter makes belts and key rings.Peter uses cowhide leather.He sells his leather goods in St.Merryn .He knows two other people who sell their own crafts.They are Mr.Rutherford at Harvose and Mr Roddis at Rainbows end.The sort of tools he uses are knifes,stamps,hole punches,stain,plyers,mallets,needles and thread.
